divs: sighting detailswe were at algonac and it rained really hard, then stopped we took cover ina beer tent. then the sky turned almost completely black, the rain came down so hard everyone in tent escaped into the building attached. there was hail on ground. there are thousands still without power. when we started walking to our car is when we saw it. i think mother in law says it was red on top and had orange underneath it. i was in awe and joking that it was a ufo. my husband said it was triangle shaped. i thought more round or maybe a teardrop. not sure. i have never seen anything like this before. there are others that saw same thing. i did a search and found two videos on youtube from same date. . one from windsor canada, where a few other people posted that they saw the same thing, from detroit. they saw 2 dozen of these orange red objects.here is the link [link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg] .. then there is a video from shelby michigan, same date. [link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg] there was something different same date seen in warren, mi. and then a reply to the post from a man in rochester, mi. same date saw same thing as we did. [link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg] i am trying to connect everyone that saw the same thing, others are saying it was chinese lanterns but these were no chinese lanterns. this thing was flying. with that rain a bonfire couldnt have stayed lit, it came down with such force, like ive never seen before in my life. my husband first noticed it and told us. i thought it was a ufo, but just joking. it was directly above us. my husband is more detail oriented than i am, if you need to speak to him,im sure he would
Summary: Red orange object hovered around us then took off to the North from Algonac, Mi. maybe hour after torrential downpour.
